original_text: People worshipped the dragon because he had given his authority to the wild animal. They also worshipped the wild animal. They said, ‘Nobody is like this animal! Nobody is strong enough to fight against him!’
korean_text: 용이 짐승에게 권세를 주므로 용에게 경배하며 짐승에게 경배하여 이르되 누가 이 짐승과 같으냐 누가 능히 이와 더불어 싸우리요 하더라

sentences.original_text: because he had given his authority to the wild animal
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그가 권세를 들짐승에게 주었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: They also worshipped the wild animal

sentences.korean_translation: 이 짐승과 같은 자는 아무도 없습니다

sentences.original_text: Nobody is strong enough to fight against him
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 싸울 만큼 강한 자는 아무도 없습니다
